Uses of Package
TCP

  • Classes in TCP used by TCP 
    Class and Description
    Channel
    Interface for 1-directional channel using a pipe
    FSM
    Implements a finite state machine by repeatedly calling loop with the current state.
    PacketType
    Packet interface
    RDT10.Packet
    Packet appropriate for rdt1.0; contains data and checksum
    RDT20.Packet
    Packet appropriate for rdt2.0; contains data and checksum
    RDT21.Packet
    Packet appropriate for rdt2.1; contains data, seqnum and checksum
    RDT22.Packet
    Packet appropriate for rdt2.2; contains data, seqnum and checksum
    RDT30.Packet
    Packet appropriate for rdt3.0; contains data, seqnum and checksum
    RTDBase
    The base class for each of the RTD simulations
    RTDBase.RReceiver
    Base class for all RReceiver Classes
    RTDBase.RSender
    Base class for all RSender Classes
    StringPitcher
    Reads a text file and "pitches" one line at a time to a reader.
    TUChannel
    Implements an extension of UChannel with receiver timeout
    UChannel
    Channel implementation for simulating bit errors and lost packets.
